location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Circular no.1732 of 1855 From W. Hoart, Secretary to Government, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The circular contains an extract from a despatch from the Court of Directors (no.49 of 1854, dated 19 July 1854), stating that the education of the native populations in every district of India should be promoted and pursued by British officials.
